welcomeAboutTitle: My Project Management application is the success of your team's work.
welcomeAboutSubtitle: I bring you the development tool used by agile teams
welcomeInfoSubtitle: A kanban board is an agile project management tool designed to help visualize work, limit work-in-progress, and maximize efficiency (or flow). It can help both agile and DevOps teams establish order in their daily work. Kanban boards use cards, columns, and continuous improvement to help technology and service teams commit to the right amount of work, and get it done!
welcomeInfoText: By dividing the project into small tasks, you simplify the work process and the ability to divide the project between employees of different levels, capabilities and qualifications.
welcomeBenefitsSubtitle: By managing your project with my application, you get
welcomeBenefitTwo: Unlimited number of tasks in the project
welcomeBenefitFive: Ability to add and remove tasks at any time
welcomeBenefitSix: Ability to save and load projects
welcomeRSSSubtitle: This project was made as part of the Angular course from the community
welcomeRSSForSubtitle: The course is intended for RS School 2022Q1 students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools JavaScript, TypeScript, Git, GitHub, NPM, Webpack, CSS3 / HTML5, Chrome DevTools, Figma, REST API.
welcomeRSSFeatureOneSubtitle: The principle of 'Pay it forward' works at RS School. We share our knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return to us as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.
welcomeRSSFeatureTwoSubtitle: A recording of the webinar will be posted on the school's YouTube channel.
welcomeRSSFeatureThreeSubtitle: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment and place of residence.
welcomeRSSFeatureFourSubtitle: A certificate is issued to all those who successfully complete the course.
welcomeAuthorInfo: Junior Frontend Developer with 1+ year of working experience in Frontend Development. Skilled mostly in JavaScript and Vue. Energetic and eager to learn new skills. Clean coding is my priority.
